about_the_game: The Last Sovereign is produced completely for free and will remain free through the end of the game! This DLC exists for those who want to give a purely voluntary donation to support the game's development. Aside from fixing the game in your Steam library, it does not contain any additional benefits for TLS, all of which will remain free.
detailed_description: The Last Sovereign is produced completely for free and will remain free through the end of the game! Aside from fixing the game in your Steam library, it does not contain any additional benefits for TLS, all of which will remain free.
